class.name: Phaser.AudioSprite

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: Reference to the current game instance.

class.help: Audio Sprites are a combination of audio files and a JSON configuration.\nThe JSON follows the format of that created by https://github.com/tonistiigi/audiosprite

public.name: get
public.help: Get a sound with the given name.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.help: The name of sound to get.

public.name: play
public.help: Play a sound with the given name.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.help: The name of sound to play

parameters.name: volume
parameters.help: Volume of the sound you want to play. If none is given it will use the volume given to the Sound when it was created (which defaults to 1 if none was specified).

public.name: stop
public.help: Stop a sound with the given name.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.help: The name of sound to stop. If none is given it will stop all sounds in the audio sprite.

public.name: autoplay
public.help: Is a sound set to autoplay or not?

public.name: autoplayKey
public.help: If a sound is set to auto play, this holds the marker key of it.

public.name: game
public.help: A reference to the currently running Game.

public.name: key
public.help: Asset key for the Audio Sprite.

public.name: sounds
public.help: An object containing the Phaser.Sound objects for the Audio Sprite.
